Class.Name: Vessel
Class.Description: Types of vessels and their properties, states and characteristics

Function.Name: describe
Function.Description: Returns a description of the vessel

Function.Name: restrict
Function.Description: Sets the vessel in a restricted state

Function.Name: state
Function.Description: Sets the status of the vessel

Function.Name: anchored
Function.Description: Sets the vessel state to anchored

Function.Name: under_way
Function.Description: Sets the vessel state to under_way

Function.Name: moored
Function.Description: Sets the vessel state to moored

Function.Name: aground
Function.Description: Sets the vessel state to aground

Function.Name: force
Function.Description: Updates he force vector on the vessel
